title: Italian Adviser Becomes Latest Target in Expanding Paragon Graphite Spyware Surveillance Case

content.raw: An extract from “The Enemy Inside, the Paragon Case, Spies and Regime Methods in Giorgia Meloni’s Italy” by Francesco Cancellato, published by Rizzoli on November 11, 2025. This surveillance system continues to expand its reach into opposition figures and political operatives.
